title:
The User must be authorized to create a new addendum
- BOC User
- Club User where org is same as Playerâ€™s current org
custom_steps:
Log in as BOC
Select player from Add C BOC widget with no status (blank) by clicking their name
Go to contract history and select Create New Addendum C
Fill out all required fields
Go to complete section and change Update Addendum C Status to "Tender"
Log in as Club
Go to advanced search
Search for and select a Minor Contract with Status is Approved

Note: Player must be currently signed with the same club as the account you are logged in as.
Go to contract history and select Create New Addendum C
Fill out all required fields
Go to complete section and change Update Addendum C Status to "Tender"
custom_expected:
Successfully logged in and redirected to home page.
Player Profile opens up
Contract opens up with a new/blank Addendum C form ready to be filled out
All fields are populated with data
Status of Addendum C switches from "Preliminary" to "Tendered" in both Contract View and Contract History View.
Successfully logged in and redirected to home page
Search page opens up
Search page populates with data
Contract opens up with a new/blank Addendum C form ready to be filled out
All fields are populated with data
Status of Addendum C switches from "Preliminary" to "Tendered" in both Contract View and Contract History View.

custom_expected:

custom_steps: Find a player whose status us blank and select them by clicking their name
custom_expected: Players profile opens up

custom_steps: Go to Contract History
custom_expected: Contract History is now open

custom_steps: Click Create New and select Addendum D
custom_expected: Contract opens up to New/Blank Addendum D form

custom_steps: Fill out all required fields
custom_expected: Fields are now populated with data

custom_steps: Go to Complete section and change Update Addendum D Status to "Submit to BOC"
custom_expected: Addendum D is successfully saved and status is changed

custom_steps:
User fills out the Addendum D.

User prints, signs and uploads Addendum D .

User updates Complete Section status to "Submit to BOC"
custom_expected:
System submits the Addendum D to BOC

Addendum D status is now "Pending"
BOC gets Clipboard notification. See Clipboard - Addendum D#1
